authorizeDialogButtonCancelTooltip.message:
If you cancel this,
you can't use $name$

authorizeDialogImageHint.message:
That's what the new dialog 
 with the request for permission 
 will look like.

authorizeDialogText.message: $name$ has been built using Google App Engine technology. This means that your data remains at Google, thus keeping your data extra secure. Google App Engine needs permission to access your Google Mail account. You can revoke this access at any time.

authorizeDialogTitle.description: The title of the authorisation dialog

dateFormat.description: The date format for the calendar

errorNoActionSpecified.description: This is displayed if the user did not select an action (mark unread, star, etc.), yet
errorNoActionSpecified.message: What should MailFred do with this conversation?

errorNoTimeSpecified.description: This is displayed if the user did not select a time yet, when the actions shall be carried out
errorNoTimeSpecified.message: When should MailFred execute the action(s)?

errorNotWithinAConversation.description: This error is shown if someone tries to use our extension when not being in a conversation view
errorNotWithinAConversation.message: You have to be in conversation view to use this feature.

extTeaser.description: The teaser used for the extension page and the webstore

mailActionMarkUnreadTitle.description: The title attribute of the mark unread option
mailActionMarkUnreadTitle.message: Mark the current conversation as unread.

mailActionMoveToInboxTitle.description: The title attribute of the move to inbox option
mailActionMoveToInboxTitle.message: Move the current conversation to the inbox.

mailActionStarTitle.description: The title attribute of the starring option
mailActionStarTitle.message: Mark the current conversation with a star.

menuAdditionalActionsArchive.description: The option to archive the scheduled conversation after scheduling

menuAdditionalActionsArchiveTitle.description: The title attribute of the archive option
menuAdditionalActionsArchiveTitle.message: Archive this conversation right after scheduling, thus removing it from your inbox.

menuConstraintsNoAnswer.description: The option to constraint any scheduled action to only happen when there was no activity on the conversation

menuConstraintsNoAnswerTitle.description: The title attribute of the noanswer constraint option
menuConstraintsNoAnswerTitle.message: Only execute the planned actions if there was no activity on the conversation until the scheduling date. Forwarding an email, mailing to or from people in the conversation or to yourself is considered activity.

menuMailActions.description: The headline for the menu of selecting what action shall be done to the scheduled mail (mark unread, move to inbox, etc.)
menuMailActions.message: On scheduling, this conversation should be:

menuTime.description: The headline for the menu of selecting when the action shall be made (1 minute, next week, etc.)

menuTimePresetCloseFuture.description: This is the menu item for selecting time that opens a submenu with predefined times (next week, 2 hours, etc.)

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays14.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays14Selec.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays2.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays2Select.description: The/ text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays7.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemDays7Select.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemHours2.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemHours2Selec.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemHours4.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemHours4Selec.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMinutes1.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMinutes1Sel.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMinutes5.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMinutes5Sel.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMonths1.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemMonths1Sele.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemTomorrow14.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemTomorrow14S.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemTomorrow8.description: One of the options in the predefined time presets

menuTimePresetCloseFutureItemTomorrow8Se.description: The text that replaces the 'menuTimePresetCloseFuture' text in the main menu after selecting the according option

menuTimePresetSpecifiedDate.description: This is the menu item for selecting a time from the calendar

notificationScheduleError.description: This gets displayed within a notification if anything within the scheduling process went wrong

notificationScheduleErrorInvalidSchedule.description: Error message in case the given time could not be parsed
notificationScheduleErrorInvalidSchedule.message: The time or format of the schedule given is invalid.

notificationScheduleErrorMessageIdInvali.description: The error message when a given message ID was invalid
notificationScheduleErrorMessageIdInvali.message: The conversation you tried scheduling the actions for could not be found - did you sign up with a different GMail address?

notificationScheduleErrorNoActionSpecifi.description: Error message if there was no action given
notificationScheduleErrorNoActionSpecifi.message: For a successful scheduling, an action is needed.

notificationScheduleErrorNoScheduleTime.description: Error message when there was no schedule time given
notificationScheduleErrorNoScheduleTime.message: For a successful scheduling, a time is needed.

notificationScheduleErrorStoringFailed.description: Error if the mail could not be persisted
notificationScheduleErrorStoringFailed.message: We are sorry, but we could not process your request. Please try again later. If the problem persists contact support at support@mailfred.de.

notificationScheduleErrorTitle.description: The notification title when an error happened

notificationScheduleErrorTryLater.message: Too many emails scheduled within a very short time - please try again in a few minutes.

notificationScheduleSuccess.description: The notification text when a mail has been scheduled successfully
notificationScheduleSuccess.message: Your actions have been scheduled successfully.

notificationScheduleSuccessTitle.description: The notification title when a mail has been scheduled successfully

optionsButtonSaveLabel.description: The label for the save button in the options dialog

optionsFeedbackOptionsSaved.description: The user feedback after hitting the save button in the options dialog

optionsLabelDebugging.description: The debug setting in the options dialog

optionsLabelGmailAddress.description: The email setting in the options dialog

optionsLinkUninstall.description: The uninstall link in the options dialog

optionsLinkUninstallConfirm.message:
After revoking the authorization, MailFred will stop working.

Please note that already scheduled emails won't be processed any more either.

To complete the uninstallment process, you can simply remove the browser extension.

optionsPageTitle.description: The title of the options page

welcomeDialogButtonCancelTooltip.message:
If you don't complete the setup,
you can't use $name$

welcomeDialogImageAlt.message: Screenshot of the toolbar with the MailFred button.

welcomeDialogImageHint.message:
The MailFred button 
 on the top right in conversation view.

welcomeDialogText.message:
Thanks for installing $name$. You can access $name$ using the bow-tie icon on the top right. It will appear when you are in conversation mode.

In order for $name$ to work you have to grant access to your GMail account. Click 'Continue' to access the two authorization windows. Enjoy MailFred.

welcomeDialogTitle.description: The title of the welcome dialog
